title: Ep. 111 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description:
2 Bears, 1 Cave has partnered with the one and only Mache to bring to you a custom 2 Bears, 1 Cave shoe! Preorders for this one of a kind shoe begin this Friday, 12/17 at 11am EST and will only be open for 72 hours when the window closes Monday, 12/20 at 11am EST. So head on over to https://machecustoms.com this weekend to preorder a custom 2 Bears, 1 Cave shoe designed by Mache!

SPONSORS: - Go to https://SkylightFrame.com and enter code BEARS to get $10 off your purchase. - Go to https://WHOOP.com and use code “CAVE” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Get 20% Off + Free Shipping at https://Manscaped.com/BEARS - To start comparing quotes and simplify insurance-buying, check out Policygenius: https://policygenius.com/2BEARS1CAVE. Thanks to Policygenius for sponsoring this video! - Get three extra months free at https://ExpressVPN.com/CAVE. - Go to https://HelloFresh.com/CAVE14 and use code CAVE14 for up to 14 free meals AND 3 free gifts! - Be the big winner this holiday season with a gift from MVMT. Go to https://MVMT.COM/CAVE! Join the MOVEMENT! -Binge the entire first season of MacGruber December 16th, only on Peacock. Go to https://PeacockTV.com to sign up.

It's another episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave with Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer and we start with the bears talking about the steak they ate the night before and how meat makes Bert need to fart. The bears trade stories about their love lives with their wives, we get an update on the accountabilibuddies, the uniform changes at Hooters and how fast eats their buffalo shrimp. Bert makes Nadav find the coffee table book he saw of naked men from the Navy, Bert has a bone to pick with Starbucks' ice cubes, and we go deep into kinks with Enny.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
